title: Audit Adherence to Brand Guidelines
description: A compliance auditor reviews marketing materials to ensure they comply with the company's official brand guidelines.

tasks.description: Select a sample of 25 recent marketing materials from various departments (e.g., brochures, web pages, presentations).
tasks.expected_outcome: A diverse sample of materials is collected.

tasks.description: Review each item to ensure it uses the correct company logo, fonts, and color palette as defined in the brand style guide.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor finds several items that use an outdated version of the company logo.

tasks.description: Report the findings to the marketing department and recommend a centralized asset library to ensure everyone uses the correct brand assets.
tasks.expected_outcome: A finding and recommendation are made to improve brand consistency.
